Package pitt.search.semanticvectors.vectors

Core representations and operations on vectors over different ground fields.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Vector
    Base representation of a vector over a particular ground field and vector operations.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BinaryVector
    Binary implementation of Vector.
    BinaryVectorUtils
    This class provides standard vector methods, e.g., cosine measure, normalization, tensor utils.
    CircleLookupTable
    Singleton class for caching trig values for optimizing speed of complex vector operations.
    ComplexVector
    Complex number implementation of Vector.
    ComplexVectorUtils
    Complex number utilities class.
    PermutationUtils
    Class that provides utilities for generating special permutations.
    RealVector
    Real number implementation of Vector.
    RealVectorUtils  
    SemanticVectorCollider  
    VectorFactory
    Class for building vectors, designed to be used externally.
    VectorUtils
    This class provides some standard vector methods.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ComplexVector.Mode
    We use the 'MODE' enumeration to keep track of which mode the complex vector is in.
    RealVector.RealBindMethod
    Enumeration of binding operation options.
    VectorType
    Enumeration of the different types of coordinates that can be used for vectors, and (in the complex case), whether circular or cartesian methods are used.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    IncompatibleVectorsException
    Exception indicating an attempt to combine vectors of different types or dimension.
    ZeroVectorException  

Package pitt.search.semanticvectors.vectors Description

Core representations and operations on vectors over different ground fields.

In particular, these are used to implement Vector Symbolic Architectures over the fields of real, binary, and complex numbers.

Author:
Dominic Widdows, Trevor Cohen, Lance de Vine.
